alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 09 at 5:15PM CDT until May 09 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR COWLEY...SEDGWICK...BUTLER...SUMNER AND NORTHWESTERN CHAUTAUQUA COUNTIES... At 514 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Latham to near Udall to near Viola, moving south at 25 mph. Damaging winds are occurring far beyond the area of precipitation, and along the leading gust front. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, El Dorado, Arkansas City, Winfield, Andover, Haysville, Augusta, Wellington, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Goddard, Rose Hill, Maize, Clearwater, Cheney, Douglass and Belle Plaine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
